text: James Cecil Adams, Jr. (born 1949) is a Republican member of the North Carolina General Assembly.http://www.ncga.state.nc.us/gascripts/members/viewMember.pl?sChamber=House&nUserID;=697 He represents the 96th district. ==References== Category:Living people Category:North Carolina Republicans Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:21st-century American politicians Category:1949 births
title: Jay Adams (politician)
